definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移动电话已经使发展中国家跨越了固话网络这个阶段。

sentences.english: and they also have a greater capacity to address their emissions than developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 他们也比发展中国家更有能力解决排放能力。

sentences.english: But developing-country banks now have got things right on a number of fronts.
sentences.chinese: 但是发展中国家银行已经开始初露锋芒。

sentences.english: This has happened even in developing-world countries with far less infrastructure than Japan has.
sentences.chinese: 这甚至在基础设施远不如日本的发展中国家也是如此。

sentences.english: Of course, many developing countries are envious of China's rise.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有很多发展中国家对天朝之崛起可谓分外眼红。

sentences.english: China is the biggest developing country in this region.
sentences.chinese: 中国是本地区最大的发展中国家。

sentences.english: This year, pretty much all the growth in the world economy will come from outside the rich world.
sentences.chinese: 今年，世界经济的的增长几乎全来于发展中国家。

sentences.english: Microsatellites are now favoured by developing countries, with the notable exception of India.
sentences.chinese: 微卫星如今受到除印度之外的发展中国家的青睐。

sentences.english: Across the developing world, cities are growing at breakneck speed.
sentences.chinese: 在所有发展中国家，城市正以危险的高速度发展。

sentences.english: This injury is underreported in developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家很少报告这种伤害。

sentences.english: Regular salaried or wage-paying jobs are scarce in many developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 在许多发展中国家，正规的付薪工作很少。

sentences.english: Its core competency is developing scents for candles and air fresheners .
sentences.chinese: 其核心竞争力是发展中国家香味的蜡烛和空气清新剂。

sentences.english: Kaufmann said it’s not only developing countries that face governance challenges.
sentences.chinese: 考夫曼说，不仅发展中国家面临治理挑战。

sentences.english: Only developing countries need a developmental state, after all.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，只有发展中国家才需要“发展型国家”。

sentences.english: And a developing country may become stalled at the brain drain stage.
sentences.chinese: 在人才外流阶段发展中国家的发展可能会陷入停滞。

sentences.english: Designed to be dust-proof for citizens of developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 防尘设备是专为发展中国家设计的。

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1

definition: Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
